title: Gender swapping craze boosts Snapchat's growth
text:
Snapchat is likely to “surprise” its detractors with robust daily user growth, due to the wild success of its gender-swapping selfie filters, market researchers claim.

The filters, which use AI to show users an exaggerated vision of how they might look a member of the opposite sex, became a viral craze when released last May, prompting millions of people to download the app and many to share the results on social networks.

Now SimilarWeb, a market intelligence firm, says the feature was probably the main driver of a 32pc year- on-year increase in the number of downloads of the app on Android phones, which Snapchat has identified as crucial for its future growth.

The company’s figures back up...
description: Snapchat is likely to “surprise” its detractors with robust daily user growth, due to the wild success of its gender-swapping selfie filters, market researchers claim.
